mapper.select: SELECT VEHICLE_ID AS vehicleId, MODEL AS model, MANUFACTURER AS manufacturer, PRICE AS price, REG_DTTM AS regDttm, MOD_DTTM AS modDttm FROM MIGSTG.ERP_VEHICLE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ERP_VEHICLE (VEHICLE_ID, MODEL, MANUFACTURER, PRICE, REG_DTTM, MOD_DTTM) VALUES (#{vehicleId}, #{model}, #{manufacturer}, #{price}, #{regDttm}, #{modDttm}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE MODEL = VALUES(MODEL), MANUFACTURER = VALUES(MANUFACTURER), PRICE = VALUES(PRICE), REG_DTTM = VALUES(REG_DTTM), MOD_DTTM = VALUES(MOD_DTTM)
